TEXT: The applicant , Mr Petru Lupascu , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

The applicant was charged with fraud in DATE . During the subsequent criminal investigation , his home was searched and certain family assets were seized by order of the court . He was also prohibited from leaving the city . Since his job required frequent travel abroad , he was dismissed . In DATE he was acquitted , an acquittal upheld on appeal .

Given his acquittal , the applicant initiated an action for damages for which domestic law provided . On DATE the ORG accepted his claims in part and awarded him CARDINAL NORP lei ( ORG ) in compensation ( pecuniary and non - pecuniary loss ) and MDL CARDINAL ( the equivalent of ORG CARDINAL at the time ) in legal costs . On DATE the ORG partly set aside that judgment : it awarded him MDL CARDINAL ( the equivalent of ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL at the time ) in compensation ( non - pecuniary loss only ) and it upheld the legal costs award ( MDL CARDINAL ) . On DATE ORG upheld ORG judgment . An enforcement warrant was submitted to the bailiff , who did not enforce it .

On DATE the Prosecutor General filed a request for the annulment of the judgment of DATE , a request upheld on DATE by ORG . That court adopted a new judgment awarding him MDL MONEY ( the equivalent of ORG CARDINAL at the time ) in compensation for non - pecuniary damage and upholding the legal costs award ( MDL CARDINAL ) . That judgment was enforced in DATE .
